titles.title: Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors Act of 2005
Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors Act of 2005
Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors Act of 2005
A bill to establish the Interagency Council on Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 109-670.

calendar.text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Reported by Senator Shelby with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 109-178.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 285.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
11/17/2005--Passed Senate amended. Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors Act of 2005 - Establishes in the executive branch the independent Interagency Council on Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors, which shall identify and promote coordination of senior citizen housing, health care, and service needs.
Defines "senior" as an individual 65 years or older.
Authorizes FY2005-FY2010 appropriations.
